snippet: Aryeh Shimron, a geologist based in Jerusalem, believes he has established a common bond between two Christian relics: the James burial box and the Talpiot Tomb.
abstract: Jerusalem-based geologist Aryeh Shimron says he believes he has linked controversial archeological relics known as Talpiot Tomb ossuaries and James ossuary with soil samples collected from each relic that are geochemical match; finding is likely to reignite controversies surrounding authenticity and implications of the relics, which supporters say reveal much about Jesus Christ.
lead_paragraph: Aryeh Shimron, a geologist based in Jerusalem, believes he has established a common bond between two Christian relics: the James burial box and the Talpiot Tomb.

headline.main: Findings Reignite Debate on Claim of Jesus’ Bones
headline.print_headline: Findings Reignite Debate on Claim of Jesus’ Bones
